posts.post_content:
I am looking for any T210 Savannah players. I live in Savannah and would like to put together a team set. I have the following. Cards can be raw/graded. Have T206 to trade or ca$h. Please let me know. Thanks in advance... Ralph

Reynolds
Schulz

Also looking for a Series 4 card/cards. I have been collecting for awhile now and I don't have any Series 4 cards, if any one has any player, any condition. I would greatly appreciate it. Thank again Ralph
